articles.title: Exclusive | IRDAI mandates dematerialisation of new insurance policies by December 2022: Sources - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Dematerialisation means converting physical policy document into a modifiable online object. It means that a person will no longer need to indulge in paperwork at time of renewing the policy.
